subject: To your urgent Attention
body:
To your urgent Attention
Thanks for your email. The delivery of your consignment and all that
is attached to it is on my desk right now. I have being on series of
meeting with our fiduciary financial officers on the modalities and
effectiveness of delivering your consignment without hitches. I am
happy to announce to you that your consignment will reach you without
hindrances and hitch free. Our delivery diplomats will leave here on
Wednesday 14th September 2022 about 11:45 pm to arrive your Country on
Thursday 15th September 2022.
Most importantly, considering the weight of the consignment, you are
advised to hold in your hands $3,200 as clearing fees . Once they get
to the airport in your Country, they will call you and give you
further directives. I have briefed the diplomat about our perfect
delivery plans but you must do your part by making available the said
fee for a smooth delivery as scheduled.
Yours Sincerely,
David Lindo

subject: Re:   To your urgent Attention
body:
Dear David Lindo,

Thank you for your email. I am glad to hear that the delivery is being handled professionally and with care. 

However, I would like to clarify a few things. You mentioned a clearing fee that I need to have in hand. Could you please specify the exact amount of this fee? Also, could you provide more details about the delivery process? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Allen
